title: Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Floor Lamp", 1929–31
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in red ink at lower right: DO[torn] DESKEY/[torn]/145 [...]/ NE[...]
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: 1 1/2" sc. LAYOUT OF BZE. LAMP FOR/ PRINTROOM/FINISH: CHROMIUM PLATED; inscribed in graphite at lower right: #155 [circled]/DRWG. # 35301; inscribed in graphite at upper left: 11; inscribed in graphite at upper right: $200 paid; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; inscribed with dimensions and materials.
dimensions: 33.1 x 25 cm (13 1/16 x 9 13/16 in.), loss, lower right
description: Floor lamp for print room of Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller apartment. Tall bronze (?) lamp with circular base of brushed metal. Shaft of lamp made of four vertical strips of brushed metal; two circular rings in between vertical strips near base of lamp and one near top of lamp. Vertical strips become supports/mount for bowl of lamp in polished metal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Floor Lamp", 1929–31.
1929–31. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-800.
